20110126233503.000|20110126233505.000|CC1|>> SHE'S HAD A LOT OF FAT       
20110126233505.000|20110126233506.000|CC1|INJECTION AND SHE'S HAD JUST    
20110126233506.000|20110126233507.000|CC1|WAY TOO MUCH OF IT.

20110126233515.000|20110126233516.000|CC1|UNNATURAL AND THAT'S DEFINITELY

20110126233521.000|20110126233523.000|CC1|SAYS LOTS OF PEOPLE HAVE ASKED
